fields.Name: HubSpot - Create Contact
fields.Description: Creates a new contact in HubSpot CRM with email, personal details, and optional company association

fields.Name: CompanyID
fields.Description: The ID of the company for multi-tenant support

fields.Name: AssociateWithCompanyId
fields.Description: HubSpot company ID to associate the contact with

fields.Name: ContactDetails
fields.Description: The created contact details from HubSpot

fields.Name: Summary
fields.Description: Summary of the contact creation operation
Invalid input parameters (e.g., missing email or invalid format)
Contact with this email already exists

fields.Name: HubSpot - Update Contact
fields.Description: Updates an existing contact in HubSpot CRM by email or ID

fields.Name: CompanyID
fields.Description: The ID of the company for multi-tenant support

fields.Name: ContactId
fields.Description: HubSpot contact ID (provide either this or Email)

fields.Name: Email
fields.Description: Contact's email to find and update (provide either this or ContactId)

fields.Name: CustomProperties
fields.Description: JSON object of custom properties to update
Contact not found with provided ID or email

fields.Name: HubSpot - Delete Contact
fields.Description: Deletes a contact from HubSpot CRM by email or ID

fields.Name: CompanyID
fields.Description: The ID of the company for multi-tenant support

fields.Name: ContactId
fields.Description: HubSpot contact ID to delete (provide either this or Email)

fields.Name: Email
fields.Description: Email of contact to delete (provide either this or ContactId)

fields.Name: HubSpot - Search Contacts
fields.Description: Searches for contacts in HubSpot using various filters like email, name, company, or custom properties

fields.Name: CompanyID
fields.Description: The ID of the company for multi-tenant support

fields.Name: SearchQuery
fields.Description: General search query across all fields

fields.Name: MaxResults
fields.Description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 100)

fields.Name: LearnWorlds - Create User
fields.Description: Creates a new user in LearnWorlds LMS with optional course enrollments

fields.Name: CompanyID
fields.Description: The ID of the company for multi-tenant support

fields.Name: Role
fields.Description: User role (student, instructor, admin) - defaults to 'student'

fields.Name: IsActive
fields.Description: Whether user account is active (defaults to true)

fields.Name: SendWelcomeEmail
fields.Description: Whether to send a welcome email to the new user

fields.Name: Tags
fields.Description: Tags to assign to the user

fields.Name: CustomFields
fields.Description: Custom field values for the user profile

fields.Name: EnrollInCourses
fields.Description: Array of course IDs to enroll the user in

fields.Name: EnrollmentResults
fields.Description: Results of course enrollments if requested
User with this email already exists

fields.Name: QuickBooks - Create Journal Entry
fields.Description: Creates a journal entry in QuickBooks with multiple debit and credit lines

fields.Name: CompanyID
fields.Description: The ID of the company for multi-tenant support

fields.Name: DocNumber
fields.Description: Document number for the journal entry

fields.Name: Lines
fields.Description: JSON array of journal entry lines with AccountID, Amount (positive for debit, negative for credit), and optional Description

fields.Name: AdjustmentEntry
fields.Description: Whether this is an adjustment entry (true/false)

fields.Name: JournalEntryID
fields.Description: ID of the created journal entry

fields.Name: TotalAmount
fields.Description: Total debit amount of the entry
Invalid input (e.g., unbalanced entry, invalid accounts)
One or more account IDs not found

fields.Name: HubSpot - Get Contact
fields.Description: Retrieves a contact from HubSpot by ID or email

fields.Name: CompanyID
fields.Description: The ID of the company for multi-tenant support

fields.Name: ContactId
fields.Description: HubSpot contact ID (provide either this or Email)

fields.Name: Email
fields.Description: Contact email (provide either this or ContactId)

fields.Name: HubSpot - Create Company
fields.Description: Creates a new company in HubSpot CRM

fields.Name: CompanyID
fields.Description: The ID of the company for multi-tenant support

fields.Name: Type
fields.Description: Company type (prospect, partner, reseller, vendor, other)
Company with this domain already exists

fields.Name: HubSpot - Update Company
fields.Description: Updates an existing company in HubSpot CRM

fields.Name: CompanyID
fields.Description: The ID of the company for multi-tenant support

fields.Name: CustomProperties
fields.Description: JSON object of custom properties to update

fields.Name: HubSpot - Create Deal
fields.Description: Creates a new deal in HubSpot CRM with associated contacts and companies

fields.Name: CompanyID
fields.Description: The ID of the company for multi-tenant support

fields.Name: AssociateWithContactIds
fields.Description: Array of contact IDs to associate

fields.Name: HubSpot - Create Task
fields.Description: Creates a task in HubSpot associated with contacts, companies, or deals

fields.Name: CompanyID
fields.Description: The ID of the company for multi-tenant support

fields.Name: HubSpot - Associate Contact to Company
fields.Description: Associates a contact with a company in HubSpot CRM

fields.Name: CompanyID
fields.Description: The ID of the company for multi-tenant support

fields.Name: AssociationType
fields.Description: Type of association (e.g., employee, decision maker)
Contact and company are already associated

fields.Name: HubSpot - Get Company
fields.Description: Retrieves company details from HubSpot by ID

fields.Name: CompanyID
fields.Description: The ID of the company for multi-tenant support

fields.Name: HubSpot - Merge Contacts
fields.Description: Merges two contacts in HubSpot, combining their data and associations

fields.Name: CompanyID
fields.Description: The ID of the company for multi-tenant support

fields.Name: SecondaryContactId
fields.Description: ID of contact to merge into primary

fields.Name: MergedContactId
fields.Description: ID of the resulting merged contact
One or both contacts not found
Cannot merge a contact with itself

fields.Description: Type of activity (call, email, meeting, note)

fields.Description: Retrieves all activities (calls, emails, meetings, notes) for a contact

fields.Name: LearnWorlds - Enroll User
fields.Description: Enrolls a user in a LearnWorlds course

fields.Name: CompanyID
fields.Description: The ID of the company for multi-tenant support

fields.Name: CourseID
fields.Description: Course or bundle ID to enroll in

fields.Name: ProductType
fields.Description: Type of product to enroll in (course or bundle)

fields.Name: NotifyUser
fields.Description: Whether to notify the user about enrollment

fields.Name: EnrollmentDetails
fields.Description: Enrollment details including ID and status

fields.Name: LearnWorlds - Get User Details
fields.Description: Retrieves detailed information about a LearnWorlds user

fields.Name: CompanyID
fields.Description: The ID of the company for multi-tenant support

fields.Name: IncludeEnrollments
fields.Description: Whether to include user's course enrollments

fields.Name: UserDetails
fields.Description: User profile details including enrollments and stats

fields.Name: LearnWorlds - Get User Enrollments
fields.Description: Retrieves all course enrollments for a specific user

fields.Name: CompanyID
fields.Description: The ID of the company for multi-tenant support

fields.Name: IncludeCourseDetails
fields.Description: Whether to include full course details for each enrollment

fields.Name: MaxResults
fields.Description: Maximum number of results to return

fields.Name: CompanyID
fields.Description: The ID of the company for multi-tenant support

fields.Name: SearchText
fields.Description: Search text to filter courses by name or description

fields.Name: CreatedAfter
fields.Description: Filter courses created after this date (ISO format)

fields.Name: CreatedBefore
fields.Description: Filter courses created before this date (ISO format)

fields.Name: IncludeEnrollmentStats
fields.Description: Whether to include enrollment statistics for each course

fields.Name: MaxResults
fields.Description: Maximum number of results to return

fields.Name: Courses
fields.Description: List of courses matching the filters

fields.Name: LearnWorlds - Get Course Details
fields.Description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific course

fields.Name: CompanyID
fields.Description: The ID of the company for multi-tenant support

fields.Name: CourseID
fields.Description: Course ID to retrieve details for

fields.Name: IncludeModules
fields.Description: Whether to include course module details

fields.Name: CourseDetails
fields.Description: Full course details including modules and instructors

fields.Name: LearnWorlds - Get User Progress
fields.Description: Gets a user's progress in a specific course

fields.Name: CompanyID
fields.Description: The ID of the company for multi-tenant support

fields.Name: CourseID
fields.Description: Course ID to get progress for (optional, returns all if omitted)

fields.Name: IncludeUnitDetails
fields.Description: Whether to include unit-level progress details

fields.Name: IncludeLessonDetails
fields.Description: Whether to include lesson-level progress details

fields.Name: LearnWorlds - Update User Progress
fields.Description: Updates a user's progress in a course

fields.Name: CompanyID
fields.Description: The ID of the company for multi-tenant support

fields.Name: CourseID
fields.Description: Course ID to update progress for

fields.Name: LessonID
fields.Description: Lesson ID to update progress for

fields.Name: Notes
fields.Description: Additional notes about the progress update

fields.Name: LearnWorlds - Get Certificates
fields.Description: Retrieves certificates earned by a user

fields.Name: CompanyID
fields.Description: The ID of the company for multi-tenant support

fields.Name: DateFrom
fields.Description: Filter certificates issued after this date (ISO format)

fields.Name: DateTo
fields.Description: Filter certificates issued before this date (ISO format)

fields.Name: IncludeDownloadLinks
fields.Description: Whether to include certificate download links

fields.Name: MaxResults
fields.Description: Maximum number of results to return

fields.Name: LearnWorlds - Get Course Analytics
fields.Description: Retrieves analytics data for a course including enrollments and completion rates

fields.Name: CompanyID
fields.Description: The ID of the company for multi-tenant support

fields.Name: CourseID
fields.Description: Course ID to get analytics for

fields.Name: DateFrom
fields.Description: Start date for analytics period (ISO format)

fields.Name: DateTo
fields.Description: End date for analytics period (ISO format)

fields.Name: IncludeUserBreakdown
fields.Description: Whether to include per-user analytics breakdown

fields.Name: LearnWorlds - Get Users
fields.Description: Retrieves a list of users from LearnWorlds with filtering options

fields.Name: CompanyID
fields.Description: The ID of the company for multi-tenant support

fields.Name: SearchText
fields.Description: Search text to filter users by name or email

fields.Name: CreatedAfter
fields.Description: Filter users created after this date (ISO format)

fields.Name: CreatedBefore
fields.Description: Filter users created before this date (ISO format)

fields.Name: IncludeCourseStats
fields.Description: Whether to include course statistics for each user

fields.Name: MaxResults
fields.Description: Maximum number of results to return

fields.Name: Users
fields.Description: List of users matching the filters

fields.Name: LearnWorlds - Get Quiz Results
fields.Description: Retrieves quiz results for a user across courses

fields.Name: CompanyID
fields.Description: The ID of the company for multi-tenant support

fields.Name: DateFrom
fields.Description: Filter results after this date (ISO format)

fields.Name: DateTo
fields.Description: Filter results before this date (ISO format)

fields.Name: MaxResults
fields.Description: Maximum number of results to return

fields.Name: LearnWorlds - Attach Tags
fields.Description: Attaches one or more tags to a LearnWorlds user

fields.Name: CompanyID
fields.Description: The ID of the company for multi-tenant support

fields.Name: Tags
fields.Description: Tags to attach to the user

fields.Name: ResultTags
fields.Description: Updated list of tags on the user

fields.Name: LearnWorlds - Detach Tags
fields.Description: Detaches one or more tags from a LearnWorlds user

fields.Name: CompanyID
fields.Description: The ID of the company for multi-tenant support

fields.Name: Tags
fields.Description: Tags to detach from the user

fields.Name: ResultTags
fields.Description: Updated list of tags on the user

fields.Name: LearnWorlds - Get Bulk Data
fields.Description: Orchestrates bulk data retrieval from LearnWorlds, fetching users, courses, bundles, enrollments, progress, certificates, and quiz results into a single sync payload

fields.Name: CompanyID
fields.Description: The ID of the company for multi-tenant support

fields.Name: IncludeUsers
fields.Description: Whether to include users in the sync payload

fields.Name: IncludeCourses
fields.Description: Whether to include courses in the sync payload

fields.Name: IncludeBundles
fields.Description: Whether to include bundles in the sync payload

fields.Name: IncludeEnrollments
fields.Description: Whether to include enrollments in the sync payload

fields.Name: IncludeProgress
fields.Description: Whether to include progress data in the sync payload

fields.Name: IncludeCertificates
fields.Description: Whether to include certificates in the sync payload

fields.Name: IncludeQuizResults
fields.Description: Whether to include quiz results in the sync payload

fields.Name: MaxResultsPerEntity
fields.Description: Maximum number of results per entity type

fields.Name: SyncPayload
fields.Description: Complete sync payload containing all requested data

fields.Name: TotalApiCalls
fields.Description: Total number of API calls made

fields.Name: Errors
fields.Description: List of errors encountered during sync

fields.Name: LearnWorlds - Get Bundles
fields.Description: Retrieves course bundles from LearnWorlds with optional search filtering

fields.Description: The ID of the company for multi-tenant support

fields.Name: SearchText
fields.Description: Search text to filter bundles by name

fields.Name: MaxResults
fields.Description: Maximum number of results to return

fields.Name: LearnWorlds - Onboard Learner
fields.Description: Orchestrates full learner onboarding: create or find user, enroll in courses/bundles, and generate SSO login URL

fields.Name: CompanyID
fields.Description: The ID of the company for multi-tenant support

fields.Name: Tags
fields.Description: Tags to assign to the learner

fields.Name: CustomFields
fields.Description: Custom field values for the learner profile

fields.Name: CourseIDs
fields.Description: Course IDs to enroll the learner in

fields.Name: BundleIDs
fields.Description: Bundle IDs to enroll the learner in

fields.Name: RedirectTo
fields.Description: URL to redirect to after SSO login

fields.Name: SendWelcomeEmail
fields.Description: Whether to send a welcome email

fields.Name: LoginURL
fields.Description: SSO login URL for the learner

fields.Name: IsNewUser
fields.Description: Whether a new user was created

fields.Name: LearnWorlds - SSO Login
fields.Description: Generates an SSO login URL for a LearnWorlds user

fields.Name: CompanyID

fields.Description: User's email address (either Email or UserID must be provided)

fields.Name: UserID
fields.Description: LearnWorlds user ID (either Email or UserID must be provided)

fields.Name: RedirectTo
fields.Description: URL to redirect to after SSO login

fields.Name: LoginURL
fields.Description: SSO login URL for the user
